name: cubeMap(withContentsOf:options:queue:completionHandler:)
desc: Asynchronously loads a cube map texture image from a single URL and creates a new texture from the data.
declaration:
func cubeMap(withContentsOf url: URL, 
     options: [String : NSNumber]? = nil, 
       queue: DispatchQueue?, 
completionHandler block: @escaping GLKTextureLoaderCallback)
